Example of Assessment and Feedback

Nana knew that self-assessment is a very demanding task for any learner,

so she needed to ensure that the questionnaire was very light and easy to complete again and again.

For example, students would answer digitally to one simple question:

I managed to ask for help when I needed it
  • with one star (almost succeeded),
  • two stars (yes, I did),
  • or three stars (easily).

Of course, all these sentences were also in picture format.
